caption.p: Integration of proviral and antiviral host factors (genes) with the orthologous differentially expressed genes (DEGs) in A549 and CEF cells infected with H7N9 virus. ( A) Pairwise analysis of the DEGs with proviral and antiviral host factors from siRNA screening studies. ( B) Heat map representing 21 proviral and 2 antiviral host factors (gene symbols highlighted in red) up-regulated in both virus-infected A549 and CEF cells. ( C) Functional annotation of proviral and antiviral host factors from siRNA studies in line with up-regulated DEGs in virus-infected A549 and CEF cells at 10 hpi.
